title: Sugar Rush
description: He’s been her brother’s best friend all her life. He’s always been there for her, no matter what she needed. He's loaned her money, let her borrow his car, and told her the truth about her bad haircuts.Surely, he do her this one favor.Yeah, it’s a big one. But she really needs to get rid of her V-card and she can’t ask just anyone to help her with that. She needs one night and a little coaching from a guy she trusts. Heck, she'll take twenty minutes if that's all he's got. She’s got the chocolate pie and the pink lingerie and…she really hopes he can take it from there.And that this isn’t the worst idea she’s ever had.A prequel to Sugarcoated, book one in the Hot Cakes series.
author: Erin Nicholas
